title: Aatrox is not fun to play
body: Seriously what is this shit? Does anyone actually find him fun to play? He is not even remotely fluid and feels so poorly designed in my opinion.

replies.body: Hes nothing the same, hes just a scuffed lanebully who falls off the moment laning phase ends.
go one auto one kill aatrox build, you will find it in one of my posts, i suggested it for some more fun on aatrox bc of how boring he is RIP
He is VERY fun to play with.... also he looks VERY cool
way more fun than original. Way way
I think he can be fun... but the original wasn't un-fun in any way. I'm not saying you shouldn't criticize the original, but imo it was a fun champ.
The new rework may not be Aatrox, but I think he's fun
